channel.title: 1.0.3 Patch Notes
channel.description:
## General: * Added chat to end game screen. * Attacks that bypass night immunity will now tell the player that it bypassed their immunity. * There is now the option to have extra info for notifications such as getting occupied or trying to visit an unvisitable target. It will tell you the possible classes that caused these things to happen. The option is on by default. * You can now right click a player in the player panel to bring up a whisper UI. It works like the Trollbox, just type what you want there, hit send, and it'll whisper to the person.
## Fool: * If the Fool is executed before Day 4, the Court will be unable to execute for two days. Otherwise the Court will only be unable to execute for one day.
## Scorned: * Will no longer be able to use abilities once their targets are executed.
## Bug Fixes: * Some.

item.description:

Some sort of way to identify the host at the end-of-game screen would be cool, for log-getting porpoises.

item.title: 1.0.3 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
General:

  • Added chat to end game screen.
  • Attacks that bypass night immunity will now tell the player that it bypassed their immunity.
  • There is now the option to have extra info for notifications such as getting occupied or trying to visit an unvisitable target. It will tell you the possible classes that caused these things to happen. The option is on by default.
  • You can now right click a player in the player panel to bring up a whisper UI. It works like the Trollbox, just type what you want there, hit send, and itâ€™ll whisper to the person.

Fool:

  • If the Fool is executed before Day 4, the Court will be unable to execute for two days. Otherwise the Court will only be unable to execute for one day.

Scorned:

  • Will no longer be able to use abilities once their targets are executed.

Bug Fixes:

  • Some.

Read full topic
